caption.title: Total flavonoids content (mg QE/g dry weight).
caption.p: In the figure different lower case letters (a, b, c, d, e, x, y, z, w, v) in the bars indicates significant differences among means (P<0.05). The blue and red colour bars indicate the aqueous and 70% ethanolic extracts, respectively. X-axis denotes the plant name and Y-axis denotes the concentrations of total flavonoids contents (mg Quercetin Equivalent/g Dry Weight).
